p: Vitamin and mineral deficiencies can also occur because of the limited consumption of fruit and vegetables, grains, and calcium-rich foods. The main deficiencies observed in children treated with restrictive KDs concern vitamins B [ 1], vitamin C [ 62], vitamin D and calcium [ 63], selenium [ 64, 65], and magnesium [ 66]. Carbohydrates-free multivitamin and mineral products are, therefore, recommended to prevent such deficiencies [ 1].
